title: Ep 66:  Spring Product Check-In with Joanna Goddard
itunes:title: Ep 66:  Spring Product Check-In with Joanna Goddard
itunes:subtitle: This week Doree and Kate talk health anxiety, meditating, and nesting and nursery prep. Plus, they share their current skincare routines and favorite products for spring.Then they welcome Joanna Goddard, creator and founder of the beloved lifestyle we...
description:
This week Doree and Kate talk health anxiety, meditating, and nesting and nursery prep. Plus, they share their current skincare routines and favorite products for spring.

Then they welcome Joanna Goddard, creator and founder of the beloved lifestyle website A Cup of Jo. She shares the origin story of her blog, tips on embracing constructive feedback, her experience with postpartum depression, and her current favorite sunscreen.

Follow us on Instagram: @Forever35podcast, @katespencer,@doree, Twitter: @forever35pod, and in our Facebook group (password is "serums"). All products mentioned on the show can be found on our website , Forever35podcast.com. To leave us a voicemail, call 781-591-0390, or you can email us at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This episode is sponsored by:

  • PHLUR - Get 20% off your first custom PHLUR sample set when you go to phlur.com and use promo code FOREVER35.
  • FabFitFun - For $10 off your first FabFitFun box, visit fabfitfun.com and use promo code FOREVER35.
  • ThirdLove - Go to thirdlove.com/forever get 15% off your first purchase.
  • Living Proof - For a FREE sample of dry shampoo with your purchase, visit www.livingproof.com/forever35 and use promo code FOREVER35.
  • Rothy’s - Go to rothys.com and use promo code FOREVER35 for free shipping, free returns, and free exchanges.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
